post.description:
Add a single document to the Aryn platform.

This API calls DocParse to partition the document, and automatically
extracts any properties registered as part of the DocSet schema. This
method can take some time, so callers should consider invoking it via the
async endpoint.

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the docset to which to add the doc.
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the docset to which to add the doc.

get.description:
List documents in a DocSet with pagination.

Args:
    docset_id: The ID of the DocSet
    next_token: Token for the next page of results
    page_size: Number of items per page (default 100)
    filter_dict: JSON string containing filter parameters

Returns:
    List[DocumentMetadata]: Paginated list of document metadata in the DocSet

schema.title: Response List Docs V1 Storage Docsets  Docset Id  Docs Get

get.description:
Get a document from a DocSet.

Args:
    docset_id: The ID of the DocSet
    doc_id: The ID of the document

Returns:
    Document: Document data including elements, embeddings, metadata, and binary data

delete.description:
Remove a document from a DocSet and delete the file.

Args:
    docset_id: The ID of the DocSet
    doc_id: The ID of the document to remove

patch.description:
Updates the properties of an individual document in place. This call can
be used to replace one or more properties with a new value. The update
syntax is based on [JSON Patch](https://jsonpatch.com), though we
currently support only the replace operation.

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The id of the DocSet containing the document to update.
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The id of the DocSet containing the document to update.

parameters.name: doc_id

schema.description: The id of the document to update.
schema.title: Doc Id

parameters.description: The id of the document to update.

get.description:
Get binary original source file with range request support.

Args:
    docset_id: The ID of the DocSet
    doc_id: The ID of the document

Returns:
    the content

List all DocSets in the system.

Returns:
    list[DocSetMetadata]: A list of DocSet metadata objects

Note:
    Will be paginated in v2

post.description:
Create a new DocSet.

Args:
    name (str): The name for the new DocSet

Returns:
    DocSetMetadata: Metadata of the newly created DocSet

get.description:
Get metadata for a specific DocSet.

Args:
    docset_id (str): The unique identifier of the DocSet

Returns:
    DocSetMetadata: Metadata object containing DocSet information

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.

patch.description:
Updates the metadata associated with a docset.

Currently, this will replace any field that is set (non-None) in the update. In
v2 we will add support for proper update masks a la AIP-134.

At present, the prompts and query_schema fields will be completely
replaced -- there is not currently a mechanism to update a subfield.

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.

delete.description:
Delete a specific DocSet.

Args:
    docset_id (str): The unique identifier of the DocSet

Returns:
    DocSetMetadata: Metadata object containing DocSet information

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.

post.description: Sets the read-only status of the DocSet.

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the DocSet.

post.description: Generate a query plan for the given query, but do not run it.

patch.description: Take an existing plan and user feedback to rewrite it.

post.description:
Run the given query.

If the `stream` parameter is set to true, the result will be streamed back to the client as a series of SSE events.
Otherwise, the result will be returned as a QueryResult object.
Extract properties given in the schema from the DocSet.

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The ID of the DocSet to extract properties from
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The ID of the DocSet to extract properties from

schema.description: A Schema describing the fields to extract from the DocSet

post.description: Delete properties given in the schema from the DocSet.

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The ID of the DocSet to delete properties from
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The ID of the DocSet to delete properties from

schema.description: A list of field names to delete from the DocSet

parameters.name: docset_id

schema.description: The ID of the docset to query.
schema.title: Docset Id

parameters.description: The ID of the docset to query.

parameters.name: page_size

schema.description: The number of results to return per page.
schema.title: Page Size

parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: page_token

schema.description: Reserved for future use. A pagination token to retrieve the next page of results.
schema.title: Page Token

parameters.description: Reserved for future use. A pagination token to retrieve the next page of results.

file.title: File
file.description: The file to add to the Aryn platform.

options.title: Options
options.description: DocParse options to use during partitioning

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Feedback about the existing plan or instructions to modify it.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: The account id containing the DocSet.

docset_id.title: Docset Id
docset_id.description: The unique id for the DocSet.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The creation time of this DocSet.

size.title: Size
size.description: The number of documents in the DocSet.

prompts.title: Prompts
prompts.description: The prompts associated with this DocSet.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique id for the Document.

elements.title: Elements
elements.description: The elements contained in the Document.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: A map of properties for the Document.

binary_data.title: Binary Data
binary_data.description: The binary content of the document, encoded as a base64 string.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: The account id containing the Document.

doc_id.title: Doc Id
doc_id.description: The unique id for the Document.

docset_id.title: Docset Id
docset_id.description: The unique id for the DocSet containing the Document.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The time at which this document was added to the system.

size.title: Size
size.description: The size of the Document in bytes.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The content type of the source Document.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique id for the Element.

text_representation.title: Text Representation
text_representation.description: The text representation of the Element.

embedding.title: Embedding
embedding.description: The vector embedding of the Element.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: A map of properties for the Element.

bbox.title: Bbox
bbox.description: The bounding box of the Element.

operations.title: Operations
operations.description: A list of updates to a document that will be applied sequentially.

query.title: Query
query.description: The query that the plan is for.

nodes.title: Nodes
nodes.description: A mapping of node IDs to nodes in the query plan.

result_node.title: Result Node
result_node.description: The ID of the node that is the result of the query.

llm_prompt.title: Llm Prompt
llm_prompt.description: The LLM prompt that was used to generate this query plan.

llm_plan.title: Llm Plan
llm_plan.description: The result generated by the LLM.

LogicalPlan.title: LogicalPlan
LogicalPlan.description: A logical query plan used to evaluate a query.

node_id.title: Node Id
node_id.description: A unique integer ID representing this node.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of why this operator was chosen for this query plan.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: A list of node IDs that this operation depends on.

Node.title: Node
Node.description: A single operation in a logical plan.

docset_id.title: Docset Id
docset_id.description: The docset against which to run the query

query.title: Query
query.description: The natural language query to run. if specified, `plan` must not be set.

plan.description: The logical query plan to run. If specified, `query` must not be set.

stream.title: Stream
stream.description: If true, query results will be streamed back to the client as they are generated. Applies only when calling the query api.

summarize_result.title: Summarize Result
summarize_result.description:
If true, an english summary of the result in context of the original query will be returned.
Applies only when calling the query API and only available when `stream=True`

rag_mode.title: Rag Mode
rag_mode.description: If true, the query will only run a RAG query plan.

Query.title: Query
Query.description: A query against a DocSet. Contains either a natural language string or a query plan.

op.title: Op
op.description: The type of JSON Patch operation. Currently only 'replace' is supported

path.title: Path
path.description: a [JSON Pointer](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6901) object identifying the value to be replaced.

value.description: The new value to replace the existing value.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: A list of properties belong to this schema.

Schema-Input.title: Schema
Schema-Input.description: Represents the schema of a DocSet.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: A list of properties belong to this schema.

Schema-Output.title: Schema
Schema-Output.description: Represents the schema of a DocSet.

default.title: Default
default.description: The default value for the property.

description.title: Description
description.description: A natural language description of the property.

examples.title: Examples
examples.description: A list of example values for the property.

SchemaProperty-Input.title: SchemaProperty
SchemaProperty-Input.description: Represents a field in a DocSet schema.

default.title: Default
default.description: The default value for the property.

description.title: Description
description.description: A natural language description of the property.

examples.title: Examples
examples.description: A list of example values for the property.

SchemaProperty-Output.title: SchemaProperty
SchemaProperty-Output.description: Represents a field in a DocSet schema.

names.title: Names
names.description: A list of names of properties that belong to a schema.

SchemaPropertyNames.title: SchemaPropertyNames
SchemaPropertyNames.description: Represents the names of properties belonging to a DocSet schema.

query_type.title: Query Type
query_type.description: The type of query to perform.

properties_filter.title: Properties Filter
properties_filter.description: A filter to apply to the properties of the documents.

return_type.title: Return Type
return_type.description: The type of result to return.

include_fields.title: Include Fields
include_fields.description: When specified, the server performs a projection to return only the fields specified by this list of JsonPaths (see RFC 9535) given as a list of strings.

debug_info.title: Debug Info
debug_info.description: When `True`, the server returns additional debug information (the embedding calculated for a vector or hybrid query) in the response.

include_element_embedding.title: Include Element Embedding
include_element_embedding.description: When `False`, and return_type is "element", the server does not return the embeddings of elements in the response.

results.title: Results
results.description: The list of results returned by the query. These are Json objects representing the documents or elements that matched the query, possibly filtered by the optional projection specified by include_fields.

query_embedding.title: Query Embedding
query_embedding.description: The embedding calculated for the query, if the query type is vector or hybrid and `debug_info` is True.

next_page_token.title: Next Page Token
next_page_token.description: Reserved for future use. Will be a pagination token that can be used to retrieve the next page of results.
